Class ConsoleFrontClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.nolix.core.bases.OptionalSignableElement<C>

          • ch.nolix.system.consoleClient.ConsoleFrontClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closable, OptionalSignable<ConsoleFrontClient>, Resettable, Signable<ConsoleFrontClient>, Signed, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public final class ConsoleFrontClient
extends BaseGUIClient<ConsoleFrontClient>
    A console front client is a client that provides a console.
    Author:
    Silvan Wyss
